result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Jairo Javier Infante Justo

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Jairo Javier Infante Justo in court.  Attorney Grace Hagerman in court for Jairo Javier Infante Justo.  Prosecuting attorney Andrew Herrmann in court for the State of Wisconsin. Requesting 30 days. Minutes filed.
Status conference scheduled for December 14, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Bail/Bond Forfeiture Hearing scheduled for December 14, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Jairo Javier Infante Justo in court.  Attorney Grace Hagerman in court for Jairo Javier Infante Justo.  Attorney J J. Crawford in court for State of Wisconsin. Called @ 1:28 p.m. Appearances made. Matter before the Court for adjourned initial appearance on both files - 22CM469 & 22CT428. Record by Atty. Hagerman who enters not guilty pleas on all counts and requests status. Court sets status as requested.
Status conference scheduled for November 1, 2022 at 01:15 pm.
Bail/Bond Forfeiture Hearing scheduled for November 1, 2022 at 01:15 pm.

records.descr: Demand for Discovery and Inspection - Defendant

records.addlTxt: Original Warrant filed with the court.
Signed bond filed with the court.

BOND TO COVER 22CM469 & 22CT428

Defendant shall not possess or consume alcohol. Defendant shall not drive a motor vehicle without a valid driver's license. Defendant shall not possess or use illegal drugs or drug paraphernalia. Defendant shall personally ensure that payments are made under any Order for Income Withholding if the Court appoints an attorney for the defendant.

Defendant Jairo Javier Infante Justo in court, in custody by video.  Prosecuting attorney J J. Crawford in court for the State of Wisconsin. Attorney Obi Uzowulu appeared. Defendant qualifies for SPD. Defendant has pending OWI in Waukesha and Rock counties. Cash bond set to cover both cases. Minutes filed.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for September 16, 2022 at 01:15 pm.

Defendant Jairo Javier Infante Justo not in court.  Prosecuting attorney Vivien L. TenHaken in court for the State of Wisconsin. Warrant to issue, bond ordered forfeited. Minutes filed.
Bail/Bond Forfeiture Hearing scheduled for October 14, 2022 at 01:15 pm.
Notice of Motion and Motion for Establishment of Discovery Deadlines.
